title: Black Coffee
description: Black coffee is as simple as it gets with ground coffee beans soaked in hot water, served hot. And if you want to sound fancy, you can properly call it black coffee name: café noir.

title: Latte
description: As the most popular coffee drink out there, latte consists of a shot of espresso and steamed milk with just a dollop of foam. It can be ordered unflavored or flavored with everything from vanilla to pumpkin spice.

title: Caramel Latte
description: About you like latte with a special taste, caramel latte can be the best option to give you an experience of the natural sweetness and creaminess of steamed milk and caramel.

title: Cappuccino
description: Cappuccino is a latte made with more foam than steamed milk, often with a sprinkle of cocoa powder or cinnamon on top. Sometimes you can find variations that use cream instead of milk or ones that add flavorings as well.

title: Americano
description: With a similar taste to black coffee, americano consists of an espresso shot diluted with hot water.

title: Espresso
description: An espresso shot can be served alone or used as a base for most coffee drinks, like latte and macchiato.

title: Macchiato
description: Macchiato is another espresso-based drink that has a small amount of foam on top. It's the happy medium between a cappuccino and a doppio.

title: Mocha
description: For all chocolate lovers out there, you to fall in love with a mocha. Mocha is a chocolate espresso drink with steamed milk and foam.

title: Hot Chocolate
description: Under cold winter days, a cup of hot chocolate makes you feel comfortable and happy. It also makes you feel good because it contains energizing caffeine.

title: Chai Latte
description: If you are looking for a tasty hot drink in the middle of winter, choose chai latte. The combination of cardamom and cinnamon gives a wonderful taste.

title: Matcha Latte
description: Matcha latte is a green, healthy coffee drink with finely crushed matcha tea and milk, offering mild sweetness, a unique flavor and a mild caffeine kick.

title: Seasonal Brew
description: Seasonal coffee with different flavors such as caramel, fruit and chocolate

title: Black Tea
description: Black tea was born in China. It is made from the leaves of a plant called Camellia and can be flavored differently with fruits for example. A pleasant, warm, tasty and aromatic drink suitable for everyday use.

title: Islatte
description: Iced latte is a chilled coffee drink made by to mix espresso and chilled milk. It is served with ice cubes and is also known as cafè latte iced or latte on the rocks.

title: Islatte Mocha
description: Iced latte Mocha is a combination of latte and mocha, which itself is a combination of chocolate and coffee. It gives cold drink lovers a delicious experience of chocolate and coffee.

title: Frapino Caramel
description: It is a blended or better said shaken coffee with whipped cream on top. A must for hot summer days.

title: Frapino Suede
description: Another famous and delicious cold drink for those who prefer chocolate. Imagine the taste of a shake with chocolate and whipped cream on top.

title: Orange juice
description: We have nothing to say about our freshly squeezed orange juice. You have to try it yourself.

title: Frozen Lemonade
description: Frozen lemonade is a refreshing summer drink that combines freshly squeezed lemon juice, ice and sweetener for a cooling, sour and sweet-sour taste sensation.

title: Lemonad
description: Was famous in Paris first and then became very popular throughout Europe. This sweet, colorless, carbonated drink is made by mixing lemon juice and carbonated water.

title: Frozen Lemonade
description: Frozen Lemonade is a refreshing summer drink that combines freshly squeezed lemon juice, ice and sweetener for a cooling, sour and sweet-sour taste sensation.

title: Lemonad
description: Was famous in Paris first and then became very popular throughout Europe. This sweet, colorless, carbonated drink is made by mixing lemon juice and carbonated water.
